name: Forest Seeker
description:
You are a lonely spirit looking for your place in the world. In the forest, you have to hide from the local unkindly Wisps to survive. And who knows, maybe you will meet new friends. Have fun!

How to play:

Press the button with blue spirit to fly, avoid electric spirits, collect orbs to gain protection and restore health.

For any questions or suggestions send email with subject "ForestSeeker" to: veronikamart1994@gmail.com
